noAssignmentBody: It looks like this page was refreshed or opened directly. Please go back and try again.
step1_body_exp: A validated questionnaire to measure your current social-emotional learning level.
step2_body_exp: Work through a realistic scenario and respond authentically.
step3_body_exp: You'll receive AI analysis and engage in a guided Socratic dialogue with CASELY.
step4_body_exp: A short paragraph summarizing your reflection.
step5_body_exp: Complete the same questionnaire again to measure progress.
step6_body_exp: Share your experience, then you're done!
step1_body_ctrl: A validated questionnaire to measure your social-emotional learning level.
step2_body_ctrl: Work through a realistic scenario and answer authentically.
step3_body_ctrl: You'll receive AI feedback, but no interactive dialogue.
step4_body_ctrl: Complete the same questionnaire again, then finish!
importantBody: There are no right or wrong answers â€” be authentic and thoughtful.
